A B C D E F G H I K L M N P R S T U V

M

Main - Class in ChatProject
The Main class is the class that runs the whole application Its a frame that has two radio buttons client/server you can choose either client or a server to run the application by clicking the button go the chosen application will pop either client or server
Main() - Constructor for class ChatProject.Main
The empty constructor of the class has all GUI to make up a single small frame this object is needed to call instances of either server or client on demand
main(String[]) - Static method in class ChatProject.Main
The main method of the class has all GUI components here
mapPositions(int) - Method in class ChessGameKenai.Board
The mapPositions method simply maps the positions to of the squares to standard chess game positions like e4, f5 etc...
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class ChessGameKenai.Square.SendData
The method mousePressed is executed when the mouse is pressed
move(int, int) - Method in class ChessGameKenai.Chess_Data
The method move simply takes two arguments the first one(x) is the current piece position and the second(y) is the destination of the current piece The piece will be moved if and only if the isMoveable method will return true if the method isMoveable returns false that means the piece is not Movable list array that we have declared in the method is used to wrap the x and y position to send it to the client or server through socket if and only if the game is played online
move() - Method in class ChessGameKenai.Non_Visual_Piece
The method move simply moves the current piece to its new position by calling the Chess_Data move method which does all the job for us
MyPopupMenu - Class in ChatProject
The MyPopup menu is a JPopup menu i have decided not to use buttons but instead the right click of the mouse will show all choices to the user This is the most simple class of my application it is brief and only creates JPopup menu and then registers it with action listener
MyPopupMenu(JList, Client) - Constructor for class ChatProject.MyPopupMenu
The overloaded constructor of the class has the references to the JList as well as to the client for calling their methods inside here like JList's getSelected index etc....
